description: Adolf Stroud is http://anidb.net/ch90555 [Lindel]`s former pupil, currently working at the College with http://anidb.net/ch94656 [Tory Innis]. He was supposed to be Lindel`s successor in his duty of keeping a watch over dragons, but couldn`t make it due to his inability to use magic.
name: Adolf Stroud
